alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Seminole, western Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Universal Studios, or over Oak Ridge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Sanford, Apopka, Altamonte Springs, Ocoee, Oviedo, Winter Springs, Winter Park, Casselberry, Maitland, Lake Mary, Longwood, Wedgefield, Windermere, Azalea Park, Oak Ridge, Avalon Park, College Park, University Of Central Florida and Goldenrod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
